name: InspiredClosets
0:
”Alexa, tell Inspired Closets to contact me”
”Alexa, ask Inspired Closets to talk to me”
”Alexa, tell Inspired Closets to reach out to me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: inspired closets
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Does your mess cause stress?  An Inspired Closets designer is standing by and ready to assist you to get and stay organized.
 
Our designers will listen and provide an organization solution to fit your unique needs. 

Working with us is easy - four short steps designed to quickly deliver the closet of your dreams.

Ready to get started?  Simply ask Alexa to connect you with an Inspired Closets designer and we’ll take care of the rest.

You’re going to love your new closet!
